content: Interesting. There are two larger towns I sometimes travel to. Each has similar stores along a main road. My brain just cannot keep them apart. To me they are a jumbled mess collided together in my mind. Where is Target? It should be right here next to Best Buy?!? Oh… that’s in the other town. How do I get there? My landmarks have merged together… memories of two separate towns permanently wrong in my cranium. Ugh.
